name: Faculty of Science & Technology
details: This faculty focuses on innovation and research in computer science, engineering, and natural sciences. Students gain hands-on experience with modern technologies and solve real-world problems.

name: Faculty of Business & Economics
details: Offers comprehensive programs in business, finance, and economics with a focus on leadership, innovation, and global market understanding.

name: Faculty of Humanities & Social Sciences
details: Encourages critical thinking, cultural understanding, and communication skills through studies in society, history, philosophy, and the human mind.

name: Faculty of Health & Life Sciences
details: Prepares students for careers in health, biology, and wellness through scientific knowledge, practical training, and ethical medical practices.

name: Faculty of Law
details: Equips students with a solid foundation in national and international law, preparing them for careers in legal practice, advocacy, and justice.

name: Faculty of Education
details: Focuses on teaching, learning psychology, curriculum design, and leadership in education to develop the next generation of educators.

name: Faculty of Arts & Design
details: Encourages creativity and visual expression through studies in art, design, media, and performance in both traditional and digital formats.

name: Faculty of Architecture & Urban Planning
details: Combines architectural design with sustainable urban planning and technical knowledge to create smarter cities and living environments.

name: Faculty of Agriculture & Environmental Studies
details: Dedicated to sustainability, agriculture, and natural resource management with a focus on modern farming, environmental science, and food systems.

name: Faculty of International Relations & Diplomacy
details: Trains students in global politics, diplomacy, and human rights to prepare for international careers in governance, peacebuilding, and foreign affairs.
